text: Ara smarana kara, yakhana allaha balabena, he isa! Ami tomake niye nebo ebam tomake nijera dike tule nibo-kapheradera theke tomake pabitra kare debo. Ara yara tomara anugata rayeche taderake kiyamatera dina paryanta yara asbikrti jnapana kare tadera upara jayi kare rakhabo. Bastutah tomadera saba'ike amara kache'i phire asate habe. Takhana ye bisaye tomara bibada karate, ami tomadera madhye tara phayasala kare debo.
